tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE vendor_contracts (
  contract_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  vendor_name VARCHAR,
  key_terms TEXT,
  renewal_date DATE,
  performance_benchmarks TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE VendorContracts (
    contract_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vendor_name VARCHAR(255),
    key_terms TEXT,
    renewal_date DATE,
    performance_benchmarks TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE ContractRenewal (
    renewal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_id INT,
    renewal_date DATE,
    additional_terms TEXT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_vendor_contract FOREIGN KEY (contract_id) REFERENCES VendorContracts(contract_id)
)

CREATE TABLE PerformanceMetrics (
    metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_id INT,
    metric_name VARCHAR(255),
    metric_value DECIMAL,
    CONSTRAINT fk_vendor_contract FOREIGN KEY (contract_id) REFERENCES VendorContracts(contract_id)
)

CREATE TABLE vendor_contracts (
    contract_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vendor_name VARCHAR(255),
    key_terms TEXT,
    renewal_date DATE,
    performance_benchmarks TEXT
);
